actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-369.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3721) to temporarily increase the limit on the public debt and to restore the investments of the Social Security Trust Funds and other trust funds.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3721 (public debt limit and government trust funds restoration).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3721) to temporarily increase the limit on the public debt and to restore the investments of the Social Security Trust Funds and other trust funds.
